forensic_challenges.name: Log File Anomaly Detection
forensic_challenges.description: Analyze the provided log files to identify unusual patterns that could indicate a security breach.
forensic_challenges.scenario: A series of log files from a government server have been provided. Your task is to identify any anomalies that could suggest unauthorized access or malicious activity.
hints: Look for login attempts during unusual hours.
Check for repeated failed login attempts from the same IP address.
Search for any commands that are not part of the usual server operations.

forensic_challenges.name: Encrypted Traffic Analysis
forensic_challenges.description: Decrypt and analyze the provided network packet capture to uncover hidden messages.
forensic_challenges.scenario: A packet capture file has been intercepted. It is suspected to contain encrypted messages that could compromise national security. Decrypt the messages and analyze their content.
hints: Identify the encryption algorithm used in the packet capture.
Use known plaintext attacks if any repetitive data patterns are found.
Check for common cryptographic weaknesses or implementation flaws.

forensic_challenges.name: Malware Reverse Engineering
forensic_challenges.description: Perform reverse engineering on the provided malware sample to understand its behavior and origin.
forensic_challenges.scenario: A new strain of malware has been detected in a government network. Reverse engineer the sample to determine its capabilities, origin, and potential mitigation strategies.
hints: Disassemble the binary to analyze the code structure.
Look for any network communication routines to identify command and control servers.
Search for strings, constants, and other indicators that could reveal the malware's purpose.

forensic_challenges.name: Steganographic Message Recovery
forensic_challenges.description: Detect and extract hidden messages from the provided multimedia files.
forensic_challenges.scenario: Sensitive information has been leaked through multimedia files. Your task is to uncover any steganographically hidden messages within these files.
hints: Analyze the file headers for anomalies.
Look for patterns in the least significant bits of image or audio files.
Use spectrum analysis to detect hidden messages in audio files.
